20101214030413.857|20101214030415.286|CCO|THAT HAS CHEST PAIN LIKE THAT, 
20101214030415.286|20101214030416.714|CCO|YOU KNOW YOU'RE GOING TO THINK 
20101214030416.714|20101214030418.143|CCO|ABOUT THE HEART POTENTIALLY 
20101214030418.143|20101214030419.571|CCO|BEING A PROBLEM HERE.

20101214030422.429|20101214030423.857|CCO|HEART SPECIFICALLY.
20101214030423.857|20101214030425.286|CCO|THERE'S A MAJOR BLOOD VESSEL 
20101214030425.286|20101214030426.714|CCO|THAT CARRIES THE BLOOD AWAY FROM
20101214030426.714|20101214030428.143|CCO|THE HEART.
20101214030428.143|20101214030429.571|CCO|IT'S CALLED THE AORTA.
20101214030429.571|20101214030431.000|CCO|AS YOU MIGHT IMAGINE BLOOD IS 
20101214030431.000|20101214030432.667|CCO|FLOWING VERY FAST HIGH PRESSURE 
20101214030432.667|20101214030434.333|CCO|THROUGH THAT AORTA.

20101214030437.667|20101214030439.333|CCO|THE AORTA.
20101214030439.333|20101214030441.000|CCO|AND THEN BLOOD SORT OF STARTS 
20101214030441.000|20101214030442.111|CCO|SEEPING INTO THE WALL OF THE 
20101214030442.111|20101214030443.222|CCO|AORTA.
20101214030443.222|20101214030444.333|CCO|>> WHY DOES IT TEAR?
20101214030444.333|20101214030445.444|CCO|>> IT'S UNCLEAR FOR SURE.
20101214030445.444|20101214030446.556|CCO|THERE ARE A COUPLE OF MAIN RISK 
20101214030446.556|20101214030447.667|CCO|FACTORS.
20101214030447.667|20101214030448.778|CCO|ONE IS HYPERTENSION, HIGH BLOOD 
20101214030448.778|20101214030449.889|CCO|PRESSURE.
20101214030449.889|20101214030451.000|CCO|AND THAT HIGH BLOOD PRESSURE 
20101214030451.000|20101214030453.000|CCO|OVER TIME CAN SORT OF ERODE THE 
20101214030453.000|20101214030455.000|CCO|INNER LAYER OF THE AORTA.
20101214030455.000|20101214030457.000|CCO|SOMETIMES PEOPLE MAY HAVE A 
20101214030457.000|20101214030459.000|CCO|GENETIC PREDISPOSITION BECAUSE 
20101214030459.000|20101214030501.000|CCO|THE TISSUE IS NOT AS STRONG AS 
20101214030501.000|20101214030502.429|CCO|WELL IN THAT AREA BUT USUALLY 
20101214030502.429|20101214030503.857|CCO|THAT HYPERTENSION IS SORT OF THE
20101214030503.857|20101214030505.286|CCO|MAIN CULL PLIT.
20101214030505.286|20101214030506.714|CCO|>> IS IT SOMETHING THAT CAN BE 
20101214030506.714|20101214030508.143|CCO|CAUGHT WITH AN ULTRASOUND OR 
20101214030508.143|20101214030509.571|CCO|SOMETHING LIKE THAT?
20101214030509.571|20101214030511.000|CCO|>> IT'S A GREAT QUESTION.

20101214030513.857|20101214030515.286|CCO|TIME THEY HAVE ANY PROBLEM

20101214030526.000|20101214030527.667|CCO|ANEURYSM, THAT'S WHEN THE AORTA

20101214030529.333|20101214030531.000|CCO|WALLS ARE WEAK AND THE ANEURYSM
